name: Speedr
description:
Speedr is a 2 player fast paced and extremely hard platformer where players must work together to complete levels and escape reapers.

-----Controls:
Player 1 (Green)
W - Jump
A - Move Left
D -Move Right

Player 2 (Blue)
Up Arrow - Jump
Left Arrow - Move Left
Right Arrow - Move Right

Make sure you read the Readme.txt file if you run into issues!
